verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Jesus Jesus Jesus
There's just something about that name
Master Savior Jesus
Like a fragrance after the rain

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Jesus Jesus Jesus
Let all heaven and earth proclaim
Kings and kingdoms may all pass away
But there's something about that name
